name: Blocky Cop Craft Running Thief
description:
POLICE STATION TO ALL AVAILABLE COPS, WE GOT A ESCAPED AND RUNNING THIEF ON THE STREETS!
Are you ready to answer this emergency call, can you become the hero of this Block Bricks City. Set in a cartoony world filled with bricks you need to craft the way to stop these running thieves who seems to constantly escape from the prison holding cells. Put a stop to crime and clear the city streets as fast as possible and make sure it is peaceful once again. Bring back order as you are set in pursuit after these jump suit blocky criminals.


EPIC BLOCKY WORLD FULL WITH CARTOON STYLED GAMEPLAY FUN SOUNDS AND ACTION PACKED LEVELS
As you are the one to save the city from crime, you earn more and more cash that you can use to craft the most cool cars. Dive into the garage buy new racing machines, change their wheels, and colors. Use them in timed missions in a awesome voxel styled city, drive fast to chase down the most wanted blocky thieves and thugs. The game is filled with a insane amount of levels and different mission types so playtime will take hours.


PLAY EVERYWHERE YOU LIKE, AND JUST RELAX AND HAVE FUN TODAY!
This cartoony racing game offers the player so much fun, make your way through the brick city traffic. Watch out you don’t damage your car, give it your best shot and free the voxel bricks city from crime today. Enjoy the gameplay, enjoy the sounds but mostly enjoy yourselfs.


BLOCKY COP CRAFT RUNNING THIEF GAMEPLAY FEATURES

- Nice blocky 3D graphics
- Hours of gameplay
- Super easy to play
- Available for young and old
- Be the best you can be

VascoGames is fully social - find us on your favorite networks to hear about our newest games and other news updates:
